description: Detects NetSupport Manager service installation on the target system.
name: NetSupport Manager Service Install
query: winlog.channel:System AND ((event.code:7045 AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager) AND (winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*\\NetSupport\ Manager\\client32.exe* OR winlog.event_data.ServiceName:Client32))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
